description: Ashley Young and Jesse Lingard showed no signs that they are feeling the pressure ahead of Thursday's clash with Manchester City as they teamed up to prank Juan Mata.
title: Ashley Young and Jesse Lingard prank Juan Mata
title_page: Ashley Young and Jesse Lingard prank Juan MataÂ  | Daily Mail Online
text:
Manchester United duo Ashley Young and Jesse Lingard showed no signs that they are feeling the pressure ahead of Thursday's clash with Manchester City as they teamed up to prank Juan Mata.
The English pair lightened the mood at Old Trafford as they teamed up with Chevrolet to get the better of the Spaniard.
The clip shows a 'United super-fan' presenting Mata with a selection of drawings that he had made of him.
Scroll down for video
Manchester United duo Ashley Young and Jesse Lingard played a prank on Juan Mata
A Manchester United 'super-fan' presented the Spaniard with some bizarre drawings
A clearly confused Mata could do nothing else but laugh at the strange situation
Little did the 28-year-old know, the meeting was a set up and his fellow United stars were watching in a nearby room.
Young and Lingard were speaking to the fan via an earpiece as he began to show the playmaker pictures of himself as different mythical creatures.
Firstly, he portrays the confused Spaniard as a Centaur and then a wizard cutting grass.
A confused Mata clearly saw the funny side ahead of the crucial match with their local rivals.
Just one point separates fifth-placed United and fourth-placed City with just six games left to play.
The 'fan' showed Mata pictures of himself as a centaur (pictured) and a wizard
